Creation.Stat Restrictions: Your Dexterity must be at least 2.

~Proficiency in Hearing~.Effect: Add your Level to all Wisdom Checks for hearing (e.g. over-hearing dialogue, noticing unusual sounds, discerning sounds, etc).

~Proficiency in Sight~.Effect: Add your Level to all Wisdom Checks for seeing (e.g. noticing things in darkness, seeing far away objects, recognizing faces, etc).

~Proficiency in Smelling~.Effect: Add your Level to all Wisdom Checks for sensing smells and identifying things based on their smell.

~Proficiency in Acrobatics~.Effect: Add your Level to all Dexterity Checks for jumping, climbing, fitting through gaps, maintaining balance and other acrobatic moves.

Language: If your Intelligence is at least 2, you can speak 1 additional Common language (Dwarvish, Elvish).
Other: Due to the variations in Bertle species, you can choose if you want your size to be Small or Medium.
Training: If your Intelligence is at least 1, you are Trained in Throwing Weapons.

Starting Abilities Description:
Bertles are natural herbivores, thus you are intolerant to meat, be it raw or cooked.
If you are starving, however, you can eat meat to sate your hunger, but you will take damage and feel sick for a period of time.
{Separator}
Aside from that, Bertles are vulnerable to poisons.
As an upside, Bertles have extra movement speed compared to other Races. That speed will be detrimental in combat!

~Fleet Footed~.Effect: You are immune to Slows (not counting Hard Terrain).

~Nimbleness~.Effect: You can move through the spaces of enemy units (in normal conditions).

~Darkvision~.Effect: You can see up to 15 meters away in darkness, without discerning colors.
